root: ^Me? Well, I'm Reginald. What are you doing here?
^The day reset. Just like Jake said.
^We're starting the day again. Is there anything I can do?
^I'm sorry I didn't quite catch that. Now what were you doing here?
^I'm Reginald. You're not very good at answering questions-
^Sorry? What was that? Was that a threat?
^No, not a threat. It's just... Jake is going to murder you today.
^No, not Jake. He's a friend. We go way back.
^He's mad at you for refusing to fund his life-extension supplement. He doesn't think you deserve to live anymore.
^How did you know that? I'm sorry, who are you?
^He told me, before he trapped me here. Oh, and I'm a journalist?
^Actually, I work in the "Fun and Entertainment" department. Today's a little weird.
^It sounds like it. What do you mean he trapped you here?
^Today was pulled out of the timeline. It's isolated from the rest ofthe world, and just keeps looping over and over again.
^There was a portal between the two worlds hidden in a mirror, but the mirror was smashed. And, well, I'm on this side of it now.
^We're all stuck here. No one can get back anymore.
^I know. Come with me. I'm going to find a way out of here.
